borough: London Borough of Barking and Dagenham
decision_conditions: <span style="font-size:11pt"><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">The development hereby permitted shall not be occupied until the cycle parking spaces indicated in drawing no.</span><a data-can-download="true"><span style="color:#000000">C-00-04 (Revision B)&nbsp;</span></a><span style="font-family:Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif">have been fully implemented. Thereafter, the cycle parking facilities shall be permanently retained for the duration of the development. Minor amendments may be agreed in writing from time to time by the Local Planning Authority.</span></span>
The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the development hereby permitted shall match or have a similar visual appearance to those used in the existing building.

The development hereby approved shall only be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

- DRAWING XXX REV XX DATED XX
- USE [SHIFT]+[ENTER] FOR REGULAR LINE SPACING
- USE [ENTER] FOR LARGER LINE SPACING

No other drawings or documents apply.
The development hereby permitted shall be commenced before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
description: Demolition of existing burnt structure and construction of 3x self-contained units at 4 Farm Close

waste_details.reason_for_no_provision: The insurance only covers replacing what was on the site previously
